levels.description:
Passive Effect: When a trap is triggered, <$ba.sluggish>Slows</> all surrounding targets and inflicts <@ba.vup>{fake_damage_scale:0%}</> <$ba.fragile>Fragile</>, lasting for <@ba.vup>{sluggish}</>s
Active Effect: Attack Interval <@ba.vup>reduces</>; ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>; Attacks prioritize enemies affected by GRZMOT Mines
<@ba.rem>Skill activation grants 40 ammo and the skill ends when all ammo is used (Can manually deactivate skill); Gains 2 traps when this skill ends</>
